      Reservation checkReservation​(int contact, java.time.LocalDateTime timing)
      Returns the Reservation if it exists for that Customer contact number at a particular time

      Makes a Reservation with Customer, DateTime and Number of Pax

        void makeReservation​(Customer customer,
                     java.time.LocalDateTime timing,
                     int numberOfPax)
        Makes a Reservation with Customer, DateTime and Number of Pax
        Parameters:
        customer - Customer making the reservation
        timing - The DateTime of Reservation
        numberOfPax - The Number of Pax reserved for

      • removeReservation

        void removeReservation​(int contact,
                       java.time.LocalDateTime timing)
        Find the reservation of the customer with the contact number made at the timing and remove it
        Parameters:
        contact - The Contact of the Customer that made the Reservation
        timing - The DateTime of Reservation

      • checkReservation

        Parameters:
        contact - Contact Number of the Customer
        timing - Reservation DateTime

        contact - Number of the Customer that made the Reservation
        timing - Timing of the Reservation
